definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be disappointing, deceive, fail, grow lean (NH [[כָּחַשׁ]] grow lean; Hiph. convict of falsehood, refute; Aram. [[כְּחַשׁ]] grow lean; [[כַּחְשָׁא]] leanness, [[כְּחִישׁוּתָא]] leanness, weakness; Aph. as NH Hiph.)—

definitions.title: Qal.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וּבְשָׂרִי כָּחַשׁ מִשָָּׁמֶן]] Ps 109:24 my flesh hath grown lean (away) fr. fatness (‖[[בִּרְכַּי כָּֽשְׁלוּ מִצּוֹם]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וְיִכָּֽחֲשׂוּ אׂיְבֶי ְלָח]] De 33:29 thine enemies shall cringe (come cringing, i.e. orig. act deceptively, feigning obedience) to thee (cf. also

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[כִּחֵשׁ]] 1Ki 13:18, Hb Hab 3:17; [[וְכִּ֫חֶשׁ]] consec. (bef. monosyll.) Le 5:22, Job 8:18, etc.; Impf. ([[בָּהּ]])[[יְכַ֫חֶשּׁ ]] Ho 9:2; 3 fs. [[וַתְּכַחֵשׂ]] Ge 18:15, etc.; Inf. abs. [[כַּחֵשׁ]] Ho 4:2, Is 59:13; cstr. Zec 13:4; —

device, abs. Ge 18:15 (J), Jos 7:11 (JE), Ho Ho 4:2 ([[אלה וכחשׁ]] together = false swearing acc. to We:Kl. Pr.; + [[וְרָחׂחַ וְגׇנׁב וְנׇאָׂף]]), cf. [[לאׁ תִגְנׁ֑בוּ וְלאׁ־]] [[תְכַחֲשׁוּ וְלאׁ תְשַׁקְּרוּ אִישׁ בַּעֲמִיתוֹ]] Le 19:11 (H); ´[[לְמַעַן כ]] Zec 13:4 in order to deceive; sq. [[לְ]] pers. 1Ki 13:18, Job 31:28; sq. [[בְ]] pers. et rei Le 6:2, [[בְ]] rei v:Le 6:3.

act deceptively against (i.e. seem to acknowledge, but not really do so), sq. [[בְ]] pers. Jos 24:27 (E), Je 5:12, Is 59:13, Job 8:18, appar. also [[בָּהּ]] ´[[וְתִירוֹשׁ יכ]] Ho 9:2 and new wine shall deny her (Isr.; i.e. refuse to acknowledge her as its mistress, not yield itself to her); abs. Pr 30:9.
cringe = come cringing (make shew of obedience, v. Niph.) sq. [[בְ]] pers. Ps 18:45 (Hithp. in ‖ 2Sa 22:45); sq. [[לְ]] pers. Ps 66:3, Ps 81:16.
disappoint, fail, abs. [[כִּחֵשׁ מַעֲשֵׂה זַיִת]] Hb Hab 3:17 the product of the olive hath failed (in sense comp. Ho 9:2 supr.)

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְכַּחֲשׁוּ לִי]] 2Sa 22:45 shall come cringing to me (‖ Ps 18:45. v. supr.)
